short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An effective tool for Amazon online arbitrage sellers to increase efficiency.
short.zh_CN: 亚马逊OA卖家效率工具, 支持批量查询销售权限、自动爬取卖家ASIN、自动申请销售权限等。 ——唤我周周

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that helps Amazon Online Arbitrage sellers improve their efficiency. 

Its main features include: 
✔ batch query ASIN's sales permissions
✔ automatically crawl seller's ASINs(aka spy other sellers)
✔ automatically apply for sales permissions
✔ automatically export query results to spreadsheets
✔ ...

It supports 'crawl → check permissions → apply permissions' fully automatic unattended operation, supports importing from files, and eliminates tedious operations such as filtering, deduplication, copying, pasting, etc. of EXCEL spreadsheets! 

Combined with the 'result view' and 'website shortcut jump' functions, it can greatly improve the seller's efficiency!

If you encounter any bugs or have any feature suggestions, please send an email to asinchecker@hotmail.com.
long.zh_CN:
主要功能：

✔ 批量查询销售权限，支持多任务队列查询，支持从TXT、表格导入查询权限，查询完成自动处理表格后导出，告别表格繁琐操作。
✔ 无限爬取竞对ASIN，无需手动一个一个卖家SPY了。
✔ 自动申请销售权限，大大节约时间。
✔ 支持“爬取→查权→申请权限”全自动，不用自己去找ASIN来查权，只需要检查利润、侵权等，然后网站选品。
✔ 一目了然的结果查看视图，选品网站可一键跳转。

如遇bug，或者有任何功能建议，可以关注微信公众号“ASIN Checker”或者发送邮件到 asinchecker@hotmail.com 进行反馈。
